author: Kevin Woodford
method: Heat the oil in a wok. When very hot and smoking add the cabbage and apple. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes. Add the ground ginger, red wine vinegar and brown sugar and cook for 10 minutes, stirring regularly. Serve in a bowl and top with the chopped parsley.
ingredients: 1 tsp olive oil,  ½ red cabbage, finely sliced,  1 apple, peeled and sliced,  ½ tsp ground ginger,  2 tbsp red wine vinegar,  1 tbsp brown sugar,  handful fresh parsley, chopped
